We are offering free virtual private servers, with the promise of quality. 

Free VPS specs : 

128MB RAM

5GB HDD

200GB Bandwidth @ 100Mbps

Upto 64 IPv6/NATed IPv4

99% Uptime

Control Panel : OVZ-Web-Panel (We'll be moving to feathur soon)

Fees: $0/month for life of account | $2.50 one-time setup fee

Order Link : [Click Here](https://clients.gadgedz.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

Please note that all orders are manually reviewed and processed, so a delay in provision of your VPS is expected.
